title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 45 - Gross Income
content:

State Regulations
§ 45.1 - Taxability of utilities of the first class
§ 45.2 - Methods of accounting
§ 45.3 - Inclusions in gross income
§ 45.4 - Receipts from sales made and services rendered
§ 45.5 - Deductions for costs
§ 45.6 - Installment and conditional sales
§ 45.7 - Nontaxable receipts from sales and services
§ 45.8 - Interstate and foreign commerce
§ 45.9 - Sales for resale
§ 45.10 - Profits from the sale of securities
§ 45.11 - Profits from the sale of real property
§ 45.12 - Profits from the sale of personal property
§ 45.13 - Interest, dividends and royalties
§ 45.14 - Profits from any transaction within this State whatsoever

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 45

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
